properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 3:28PM CST until February 5 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
...Winter Storm to impact the region from tonight through
Wednesday...

.A light wintry mix of precipitation will spread from northwest
to southeast across the region late this afternoon and tonight as
a low pressure system approaches from the southwest. Snow will
then develop from southwest to northeast across the area on
Wednesday and may be heavy at times along and north of the
Interstate 44 corridor. A wintry mix will remain possible
Wednesday across south-central Missouri.

* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total
snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches along with up to a tenth of
an inch of ice accumulation. For the Winter Weather Advisory,
mixed precipitation. Additional ice accumulations of up to one
tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...Bourbon County.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 AM Wednesday to 6
AM CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM
CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY
